title: Ticket #3083: Condor compilation support for C++11
description:
Where possible condor should compile test and compile -std=c++11 and use new std data structures if it is possible.

In some cases such as visual studio that may be c++0x support.

Namely because the new standard versions of data structures are highly optimized.
